title: Yin-Yang Flower Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Asian, Fusion
description: A tiny, casual, all-vegan, organic cafe located just behind Shochiku Movie Studio. It's about a 5 minute walk from the Randen Katabira-no-Tsuji Station which is close to Uzumasa Movie Village and Arashiyama. Offers three kinds of meals: Plate of the day lunch (1,000짜 - accepts orders until 3:00 pm); today's curry (800짜); miso soup and brown rice balls set (600짜 - five pungent roots free). You also can order a boxed lunch (800짜) to go. Uses only GMO-free products. Prices quoted as of April 2016.
